name: I Didn't Vote For That!
description:
GMTK 2020 Jam Submission

"I Didn't Vote For That!" is a medieval city builder with less control over what you build. You get to choose where and when you build something, but not what gets built. Try to survive for 30 days while balancing your resources and avoiding fates such as starvation or enemy raids!

Credits:

I coded the game myself. My brother made the background music.

Building assets are from  Fantasy Village Pack by Tarbo Studio (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/fantasy-village-pack-140303)

Animal assets are from Low Poly Animated Animals by polyperfect (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/low-poly-animated-animals-93089)

UI assets are from Simple Fantasy UI by Unruly Games (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/simple-fantasy-ui-140925)

Sound effects are from Interface and Item Sounds by Cafofo (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/interface-and-item-sounds-89646)
